name: Strobotext.js
tagline: jQuery plugin for text with a stroboscope effect
body:
# strobotext.js a jQuery plugin for text with a stroboscope effect #### It's as easy as it gets: ```
``` ``` $('strobe').strobotext({ text : ['strobo', 'text'], // text array color : 10, // color change interval (optional) word : 300 // word change interval (optional) }); ``` ###### this might not be ideal for epileptics
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
